text: The Men's 800 metres event at the 2005 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on March 4–5. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Dmitriy Bogdanov '''' |Antonio Manuel Reina '''' |Juan de Dios Jurado '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== The winner of each heat (Q) and the next 3 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
